articles.author: Adrian Padeanu
articles.title: Watch Us Drive The 1,001-HP Lamborghini Revuelto Around Vallelunga Circuit - Motor1
articles.description: We had the chance to drive the Lamborghini Revuelto and find out how the new V12 works with the three electric motors and dual-clutch automatic transmission.
articles.content: The Revuelto is not the first Lamborghini with a plug-in hybrid powertrain, but it is the first you can buy since the 2014 Asterion was a concept. It's a superior product in the sense it has a bigger… [+1741 chars]
